application.doc: Retrieving all configuration entries for a stanza (ordered) - Reverse Proxy

param.name: id
param.doc: Name of the instance to act on, which is a unique name that identifies the instance

param.name: ordered
param.doc: To retrieve ordered configuration entries for a stanza. This path parameter is optional.

param.name: stanza_id
param.doc: The name of the resource stanza entry. For example, "server". Note: This name cannot contain the string "/entry_name" unless it is the start of the stanza name. ie "/entry_name/name" is valid but "/name/entry_name" is not.

method.name: GET
method.id: Retrieve ordered configuration entries for a stanza - Reverse Proxy Instances
method.doc: To retrieve all configuration parameters for a stanza in an ordered array with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command on the configuration entry management URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.

representation.name: configurationEntryNameAndValueJsonResponse
representation.doc: Note: Response body is an array.

param.name: entries
param.doc: entry name and value in the format of key value pairs, entries: ["entryName1", "value1"] for the specified stanza
